sn48.39:4.4: Sukhavedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:4.6: Tasseva sukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ sukhindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:5.1: Dukkhavedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:5.3: Tasseva dukkhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:6.1: Somanassavedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati somanassindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:6.3: Tasseva somanassavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ somanassavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:7.1: Domanassavedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati domanassindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:7.3: Tasseva domanassavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ domanassavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:8.1: Upekkhāvedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati upekkhindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:8.3: Tasseva upekkhāvedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ upekkhāvedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:9.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānā usmā jāyati, tejo abhinibbattati;
sn48.39:9.2: tesaṃyeva kaṭṭhānaṃ nānābhāvāvinikkhepā yā tajjā usmā sā nirujjhati sā vūpasammati;
sn48.39:9.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, sukhavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:9.5: Tasseva sukhavedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti.
sn48.39:10.4: upekkhāvedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati upekkhindriyaṃ.
sn48.39:10.6: Tasseva upekkhāvedaniyassa phassassa nirodhā ‘yaṃ tajjaṃ vedayitaṃ upekkhāvedaniyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati upekkhindriyaṃ taṃ nirujjhati, taṃ vūpasammatī’ti pajānāti”.
